title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list do not persist between sessions.
EB: The files should appear in the File menu MRU list even after closing and reopening the application.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open multiple files.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application and check if the files are still listed in the File menu MRU list.
